d3cbfd9df817fbdd76daafc2ed2a30fb264ae3","dweb:/ipfs/QmZ4g39nQgNN3AKXhzpCirYrRzibGU8bfo3TgjdwczaShJ"]},"src/protocol/economic/ruleProcessor/RuleProcessorDiamondImports.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa7c807f25a092b2a9528f0ae0965ba49b2a3ab433c892bf096355439e0ad0288","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://677291e13f00ffcf210f1d095f0415a9fb92618d0c0d3d4fa8dc40471c5370d6","dweb:/ipfs/QmSARakVv6MUytHkwCw2MA1KDczeUVhkPtjw75R3tH3boD"]},"src/protocol/economic/ruleProcessor/RuleProcessorDiamondLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc9ccabc2908d31346d3686122204a2fff0fd9385d51298767bff2db04c3c3f6c","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://149cf020c67a77a193cb83569befacb12dfcc4aaa0f433b150e691627d682aa4","dweb:/ipfs/QmYEX76UKGTsFEgHuxthZ8EJAjEwEjBkxiqCjpVU8hDJXD"]},"src/protocol/economic/ruleProcessor/RuleStoragePositionLib.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8f2c6c524778274c2c15d7dafbbaa58083d4e5c789b24ee1d80ae9663a9dc3b3","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7ef135ea5e9a5631912dc1fb51372500dc3a2ec710329e69797a8c66a76a70c9","dweb:/ipfs/Qmdd4V3yMTVQEx3YFxWGWLCxYYCiqw1Ntb8aW7LADSM8Q4"]}},"version":1}

checkMinMaxAccountBalanceERC721(uint32,u.details: Check the minMaxAccoutBalance rule. This rule ensures accounts cannot exceed or drop below specified account balances via account tags.

params.balanceFrom: Token balance of the sender address
params.balanceTo: Token balance of the recipient address
params.fromTags: tags applied via App Manager to sender address
params.ruleId: Uint value of the ruleId storage pointer for applicable rule.
params.toTags: tags applied via App Manager to recipient address

checkTokenMaxDailyTrades(uint32,uint256,.details: This function receives a rule id, which it uses to get the Token Max Daily Trades rule to check if the transfer is valid.

params.lastTransferTime: block.timestamp of most recent transaction from sender.
params.transfersWithinPeriod: Number of transfers within the time period

getAccountMinMaxTokenBalanceERC721(uint3.details: Function get the Account Min Max Token Balance ERC721 rule in the rule set that belongs to a specific tag.

returns._0: AccountMinMaxTokenBalance at index location in array

getTokenMaxDailyTrades(uint32,bytes32).details: Function get the Token Max Daily Trades rule in the rule set that belongs to an NFT type

returns._0: TokenMaxDailyTrades at index location in array

getTotalAccountMinMaxTokenBalancesERC721.details: Function gets total Account Min Max Token Balance ERC721 rules

getTotalTokenMaxDailyTrades().details: Function gets total Token Max Daily Trades rules

checkMinMaxAccountBalanceERC721(uint32,u.notice: If the rule applies to all users, it checks blank tag only. Otherwise loop through  tags and check for specific application. This was done in a minimal way to allow for   modifications later while not duplicating rule check logic.

checkTokenMaxDailyTrades(uint32,uint256,.notice: If the rule applies to all users, it checks blank tag only. Otherwise loop through  tags and check for specific application. This was done in a minimal way to allow for   modifications later while not duplicating rule check logic.
